title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
content: I am planning on ordering one of these this Friday - price for one is 89.95 however, if we get enough interest and buy 4 or more the price is 76.46 each tray with twelve 1g bars the shipping to me would be free and my shipping to you might be 4-5 bucks so total cost would be close to $80 - about $10 savings per tray (if 4 or more)https://www.ebay.com/itm/334366085748?If interested in joining let me know. or if you prefer to buy direct from them, use the link above.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: as an update - I was able to secure 4 of these - 3 of them have been bought, 1 is still available - on the plus side, I was able to get them for 65 ea so if interested in the last one, let me know - shipping in the US $5 - international, will have to calculate or can hand off to minerjones for consolidation.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptogreatdane on August 09, 2022, 04:32:19 AMIll take itSodl
